issue.title: TSC - ongoing meeting schedule
issue.body:
In our [TSC meeting on 2024-05-23](https://github.com/pq-code-package/tsc/pull/59) we agreed to review the current meeting schedule

Currently we are arranging 1-off meetings on alternate Thursdays at 1300 UTC [as agreed for the first meeting](https://github.com/pq-code-package/tsc/issues/44)

This is fairly late (2100) for Taiwan, and very early for US, particularly west-coast (0600)

TSC participants so far are spread as follows:

| Participant|Voting Member|Location|Timezone (summer)|
| -- | -- | -- | -- |
| @ajbozarth  |  | US / Texas | UTC-5 |
| @ashman-p  |  |  |  |
| @dstebila | Y | Canada / Ontario | UTC-4 | 
| @franziskuskiefer | Y | Germany | UTC+2 | 
| @hanno-becker  | Y | Germany | UTC+2 |
| @hartm |  | USA / California | UTC-7 | 
| @jschanck | Y | Canada / Ontario | UTC-4 |
| @mbbarbosa | Y | Portugal | UTC+1 |
| @mkannwischer | Y| Taiwan | UTC+8 |
| @planetf1 | Y | UK | UTC+1 |
| @ryjones |  | USA / Washington | UTC-7 |
| @tfaoliveira | Y | Portugal | UTC+1 |
| Duc Tri Nguyen | | US / VI | UTC-4 |
| Michael Maximilien |  | US / California| UTC-7 |
| Rod Chapman |  | UK | UTC+1 |
| Yarkin Doroz | | US / MA | UTC-4 |

Timezone Spread: **15 hours**
Timezone spread of voting members: **12 hours**
